entry.title: [RBX/GRA/SBG][Network] - DNS and ACE
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 3, 19:00 - 22:00 UTC

Apr 28, 23:20 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/05/2022 19:00 UTC
End time : 03/05/2022 22:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : We are currently using ACE and NSX for the connection to Hosted1 infra for HTTPS, POP3, IMAP4, etc... We want to use only NSX for that. We have to delete the IP of ACE .

So after that change, Customer will connect to NSX only in order to have access to their emails.

We are currently working with NSX AND ACE and all is working fine. The load on the CAS i very low because we have a lot of servers.
